visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: Chart type: spline, Chart title: Monthly Average Temperature, Axes and labels styling: X-axis labels should be in Arial font, size 12, and color #333333; Y-axis labels should be in Arial font, size 12, and color #333333; Data series: Series 1 should be named 'Temperature' with data [29.9, 71.5, 106.4, 129.2, 144.0, 176.0, 135.6, 148.5, 216.4, 194.1, 95.6, 54.4], Custom colors: Use #008000 for the series color, Additional configurations: Set chart margins to 50px top, 100px right, 50px bottom, and 100px left; add a legend at the bottom of the chart with a gray background.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The X-axis and Y-axis labels are styled with Arial font, size 12, and color #333333. The data series is named 'Temperature' and includes monthly temperature data for a year, with the series color set to #008000. Additional configurations include setting the chart margins to 50px top, 100px right, 50px bottom, and 100px left, and positioning the legend at the bottom of the chart with a gray background. This setup ensures a clear and visually appealing presentation of the monthly temperature data.
